### Getting started

### Changing text color

```{r}
library(htmltools)

div(
  .style %>%
    font("primary") %>%
    border("primary"),
  p("Nullam tristique diam non turpis.",
    "Pellentesque dapibus suscipit ligula.",
    "Nullam eu ante vel est convallis dignissim."),
  p("Aliquam posuere.")
)
```

### Changing font weight

```{r}
p(
  .style %>%
    font(weight = "bold"),
  "Curabitur lacinia pulvinar nibh."
)
```

```{r}
p(
  .style %>%
    font(weight = "light"),
  "Proin quam nisl, tincidunt et."
)
```
